name: contingency_reports_review_days
title: Within how many days after Acceptance will you remove the Review of Seller Documents contingency?
label: Reports Days
description: Regardless of your answer, you will always have up to 5 days after receiving a document from the seller to review it.
tips: Consider the time needed to thoroughly review all documents. The typical number of days for review is 17.
small_print: Regardless of your answer, you will always have either up to the number of days (after offer acceptance) you specify here or up to 5 days after receiving a document from the seller to review it, whichever is greater.

internal.notes: Days to remove reports review contingency

suggested.hint: The standard is 17 days. Anthing less than 10 days or more than 21 days is not recommended.
